changeAccess(String, String, Integer, Boolean) - Method in class com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4.utils.File

Never use octal numbers for the permissions like '0775'.

connect() - Static method in class com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4.RootFW
Create a new connection to the global shell.

Note that this method will fallback on a normal user shell if root could not be obtained.
